channel.title: Cross Server
channel.description:
Hey Mopar,
My Friend Has Sent Me The Files From His Server "HaxScape" Client + Source And I Love Them.
Last Night I Was Playing The Server Through Localhost And Then I Changed The IP's Back To The Normal Ones.
But Now That I Change The IP's Back To 127.0.0.1 And Compile Nothing Happens Except I Login To The Real HaxScape And Not The One Running Off My Computer, Any Help?

item.title: Cross Server
item.dc:creator: @PaNiiC PaNiiC
item.description:
@PaNiiC wrote:
